content: this legal case involves a dispute over the coownership of a real estate property the case has been going on for over 4 years the final decision is that the property will be sold at a public auction and the money will be divided among the coowners based on their ownership shares the court made this decision based on the property act and the findings of a court expert the person who started the case wanted to end the coownership while the other person disagreed with their share of the property the court decided that it was fair and necessary to dissolve the coownership
